name: Wall Chest Opener
desc: Arm at 90 degrees against the wall. Rotate your body away. Breathe.

name: Wall Calf Stretch
desc: Toes up against the wall, heel on floor. Lean in. Feel the burn.

name: Wall Squat Hold
desc: Back against wall, knees at 90 degrees. Stay there until you hate me.

name: Wall Pec Stretch (Straight Arm)
desc: Hand flat on wall, arm straight. Turn your body away slowly.

name: Wall Downward Dog
desc: Hands on wall at hip height. Walk back and drop your head between your arms.

name: Wall Hip Flexor Stretch
desc: Back knee on floor against the wall, foot pointing up. Lunge forward with other leg.

name: Wall Angels
desc: Keep your head, back, and arms against the wall. Slide arms up and down slowly.

name: Wall Butterfly
desc: Sit on floor, back against wall. Feet together, knees out. Push knees down.

name: Wall Glute Stretch
desc: Lie on back, feet on wall. Cross one ankle over knee. Push hips to floor.

name: Wall Lat Stretch
desc: Hands high on wall. Lean your chest toward the floor. Keep arms straight.

name: Wall Thoracic Bridge
desc: Stand facing away from wall. Reach back and touch the wall with one hand. Rotate.

name: Wall T-Spine Opener
desc: Side to wall. Rotate your outside arm all the way around in a circle on the wall.

name: Wall Ankle Mobilization
desc: Toe 2 inches from wall. Drive knee forward to touch the wall without lifting heel.

name: Standing Wall Twist
desc: Side to wall. Hands on wall at shoulder height. Twist your torso toward the wall.

name: Wall Scapular Pushups
desc: Hands on wall. Move only your shoulder blades in and out. Keep arms straight.

name: Wall Psoas Stretch
desc: One foot on wall behind you, other leg in lunge. Tilt pelvis up.

name: Wall Neck Isometric
desc: Side of head against wall. Push gently. Hold. Switch sides.

name: Wall Hamstring RDL
desc: Stand 6 inches from wall facing away. Hinge hips back until they touch the wall.

name: Wall Triceps Stretch
desc: Elbow high on wall. Lean in. Use the wall to push your elbow back.

name: Wall Internal Rotation
desc: Side to wall. Arm behind back, elbow touching wall. Gently lean into it.
